title: Can't connect once game is started
body:
I have lost 3 ranked games, and a normal game because everytime the game starts, it says "can't connect to server" something something, and then asks me to retry. I do, and it still won't connect.

This never occurred before. I am clearly connected to the internet, I can run everything else.

Someone, please help.

replies.body: Your network is probably just having a hard time getting connected to our servers specifically, not that you don't have any internet connection whatsoever. This can happen sometimes due to certain settings or even just weird ISP routing. Let's be sure to hit the most common fixes by going through [**these steps**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues).

I figured out it was because of a riot problem with the servers, and it has been happening a lot to others too. I changed my window setting to =1 instead of =0. It is still happening....

What should I do about my low priority queue? and the losses to my rank? I am bronze so the losses aren't huge, but the low priority queue is a huge deal.

Hmmmmm that's some high-level techno-magic you worked there if editing a file on your own pc did something to our servers on a completely different pc! That change you made to your window setting only affects whether your League runs in windowed or full-screen mode, so I'm hesitant to say that would help your connection with our servers. 

Getting hit with a low-priority queue definitely sucks, but you won't get hit with one after only one left match. It looks like you were trying over and over to get into a match, but you kept getting hit with the same connection error. We can't do much about LPQ's in this kind of situation, but I *can* suggest that in the future you try to test any changes in a custom/practice match to avoid any more penalties.

Posted by riot:
_Network Operations â€“ Yesterday at 12:22 PM
We are aware of players experiencing crashing during game start. While we are working on a permanent fix please use the following workaround. Locate the game.cfg file in \Riot Games\League of Legends\Config, open the file and edit WindowMode=0 to WindowMode=1, and then save the game.cfg file._

Now what you said seems very logical, and makes a ton of sense. So thank you. I am not sure how i thought changing code on my pc would actually impact your severs, I thought it would allow me to connect more easily by fixing a problem on my pc.

I can connect to the practice server. I'll go through everything you suggested. 

I really appreciate all your help.
I believe this was relating to the DirectX problem where you had to delete your Config file. This might have also been another fix for it. :P
